description: The morning after the riotous sheep themed house party, Nicole wakes to find Lateysha has gone home. Aron is on hand to make sure Nicole doesn’t get too lonely however his amorous advances are rejected in favour of a bit of girl on girl action. Liam’s Dj idol, Roger Sanchez, offers a few words of advice when everyone goes for a night out. But the good times don’t roll for long when a massive fight means that everyone faces a one way ticket back to the valleys.
